channel.title: Wildy and free trade it's official
channel.description: ok so i noticed that they weren't bringing the free trade or wilderness back till they got 1m votes or more and guess what??? yesterday we reached over 1 million votes! :) so it's official and i heard they would release it on the 22nd of january this is just what i have heard but idk when the real release is but this is just so exciting! :)

item.title: Wildy and free trade it's official
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“abatssk8ter, post:24, topic:377149”][quote author=drubrkletern link=topic=473060.msg3461746#msg3461746 date=1294534833]
if you guys think about it, were ALL in Jagex’s death grip, they know we wont leave forever.
[/quote]Speak for yourself, lots of people including myself have self control.[/quote]
Lots of ppl including me dont have self control, jagex controls my soul

Read full topic

item.title: Wildy and free trade it's official
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

1,1m divide 100 = 11k = 1% of votes ish.
90 x 11k = 990k yes
7 x 11k = 77k no’s
3 x 11k = 33k dunno’s

11k isn’t exactly 1% of the votes, meaning it can vary from 11k-21,999 votes per 1%

Read full topic
item.source: Wildy and free trade it's official

item.title: Wildy and free trade it's official
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

[quote=“Lin, post:17, topic:377149”]No it’s not. Do you realize they said something along the lines of “It’s not going to take 1000, or maybe not even 1 million votes. It’s going to take each and every one of you, your friends, and even your enemies.” They didn’t say “HEY GUYS IF WE GET 1 MILLION VOTES, FREE TRADE AND WILDY IS BACK! YOU DON’T EVEN HAVE TO TAKE IN THE THOUSANDS OF NOS AND 'I DON’T MIND’S!!! WOO!!!”

I swear, some of the people on this forum are just fucking stupid.[/quote]

Actually they said that about the first voting phase. In phase two they said 1 million votes. Your right some people on this forum are just fucking stupid.

Read full topic
item.source: Wildy and free trade it's official

item.description:

[quote=“abatssk8ter, post:19, topic:377149”]They will have 0 players if they dont give us this.

so i dont think they’re THAT dumb to sacrifice all there players, so i guess it is back[/quote]

They did it once, nothing is making them bring it back. If its truly not the majority that wants it back, they wont care. Its just an extremely vocal minority that will all come back within a week, regardless of the threats they seem to make.

Read full topic
